org.apache.james.protocols.api

Interface ProtocolServer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAsyncServer, NettyServer

    public interface ProtocolServer
    A ProtocolServer accept inbound traffic and handle it. Basically the protocols API can be used to handle every "line based" protocol in an easy fashion

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bind()
      Start the server
      int getBacklog()
      Return the backlog for the socket
      List<InetSocketAddress> getListenAddresses()
      Return the ips on which the server listen for connections
      int getTimeout()
      Return the read/write timeout in seconds for the socket.
      boolean isBound()
      return true if the server is bound
      void unbind()
      Stop the server
